value: The Southern region of Somalia is currently largely under the rule of the Islamic extremist faction al Shabab and is also home to most of the open fighting in Somalia! In 2012, Kenyan and Ethiopian forces have made some inroads into the region. Travel to Southern Somalia is
and at the moment should not be considered a travel destination for any reason! (Updated July 2012)

occupies about a third of the
's territory, and is home to most of the fighting in the civil war.

Currently, an Islamic terrorist group rules much of Southern Somalia. The Southern Region of Somalia is regarded as the most dangerous region in the country. All travel should be avoided until the security situation improves.
